content.question: Janice has a strong, unreasonable fear of being embarrassed in front of strangers. When she is with others she does not know, she feels extremely insecure and worried. Janiceâ€™s problems are most consistent with which of the following disorders?

topic.text: 5.4: Selection of Categories of Psychological Disorders
